"They are such a great group of people to work with." "Susan even brought us homemade food for our dogs, Teddy and Bear!" "The quality work and such clear communication makes them the best company ever!"

Canyon Oaks Pool did an absolutely incredible job building our backyard pool! From start to finish, their communication was outstanding. Any time we had a question or concern, they got back to us quickly and handled everything right away. … More Response from the owner 4 days ago Billy and Heather, thank you both so much for sharing this! Good Morning, Austin! What a wonderful surprise to wake up to—thank you so much for your kind words and five-star review! You and Katie (and the boys!) made this project an absolute joy for our entire team. Katie’s incredible custom cookie … More

We had an incredible experience from start to finish with Canyon Oak Pools! After interviewing 5-6 different pool builders and receiving designs from four of them, Canyon Oak stood out from the rest—and we’re so glad we chose them. … More Response from the owner 4 months ago
